subject: Economy
question_en: What is the concept of Gross Domestic Product (GDP)?
explanation_en: Gross National Income (GNI) refers to the total income earned by citizens of a country from all sources within and outside the country. It includes both remittances from abroad and income earned by citizens.

पूर्वान पूर्वान पूर्वान पूर्वान पूर्वान पूर्वान पूर्वान
explanation_en: The gross national product (GNP) is the total value of goods and services produced within a country, considering both domestic and foreign sales. It is calculated by deducting depreciation and net exports from GDP.
